actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to terminate any phosphate lease or rights issued or pending under serial number Riverside 04843 pursuant to the Mineral Leasing Act of February 25, 1920, as amended, within the Los Padres National Forest.

summary.text: Terminates any phosphate lease or rights issued or pending under serial number Riverside 04843 issued pursuant to the Mineral Leasing Act within the Los Padres National Forest in California.

titles.title: A bill to terminate any phosphate lease or rights issued or pending under serial number Riverside 04843 pursuant to the Mineral Leasing Act of February 25, 1920, as amended, within the Los Padres National Forest.
